joins.text: Sounds like you are feeling positive today!
Sorry to hear that, but its early days.

dialog.text: Still haven't used my webcam or asked a question - tidied up my boyfriends stuff a bit so at least its presentable but hate seeing myself on screen.  The morning meetings are really nerve-racking aren't they - I don't know what to say as I don't have have much of a plan for my days yet :thinking_face:  How's it going for you?

joins.text: Sounds like you are off to a good start.

dialog.text: I met Jeff yesterday, he's another first year - from Dundee.  You should join in the chat on Slack, I posted some memes from Xkcd which got a few laughs - which is how I met Jeff.  Better get to work now, catch you later!
